summary: This bill, the Jamie Reed Protecting Our Kids from Child Abuse Act, establishes a federal tort against pediatric gender clinics and other entities performing gender-transition procedures on minors that cause bodily injury or mental harm. It defines gender-transition procedures and provides exceptions.  It allows individuals to sue these entities and practitioners, seeking damages and attorney's fees. The bill also prohibits federal funding for pediatric gender clinics and gender-transition procedures performed on minors. The provisions apply retroactively.
